title: Sharing with Community
description: Learn how to share your MCP servers and collections with the Plugged.in community

overview.title: Overview
overview.introduction: Plugged.in enables you to share your MCP server configurations and collections with the community, fostering collaboration and knowledge sharing.

servers.title: Share MCP Servers
servers.description: Make your server configurations available for others to discover and use

collections.title: Create Collections
collections.description: Group related servers into themed collections for easier sharing

prerequisites.title: Prerequisites
prerequisites.servers: At least one configured MCP server

shareServer.title: Step 1: Share an MCP Server
shareServer.description: Make your MCP server configuration available to the community

navigate.title: Navigate to Your Server
navigate.description: Go to your MCP Servers page and select the server you want to share:
navigate.code: MCP Servers → Select Server → Share Options

visibility.title: Set Visibility
visibility.description: Choose who can see and install your server:
visibility.public: Public - Anyone can discover and install
visibility.private: Private - Only accessible via direct link

shareServer.tip: Add detailed notes and documentation to help others understand your server's purpose and configuration.

createCollection.title: Step 2: Create a Collection
createCollection.description: Group related servers into a themed collection

create.title: Create New Collection
create.description: Navigate to the Collections page and create a new collection:

organize.title: Add Servers to Collection
organize.description: Select servers from your profile to include in the collection. Collections can be versioned and updated over time.

manageSharing.title: Step 3: Manage Shared Content
manageSharing.description: Monitor and manage your shared servers and collections

profile.title: View Your Public Profile
profile.description: Check how your shared content appears to others:

stats.title: Track Installation Stats
stats.description: Monitor how many users have installed your servers and collections from the sharing dashboard.

discoverContent.title: Step 4: Discover Community Content
discoverContent.description: Find and use servers shared by other community members

browse.title: Browse Discover Feed
browse.description: Visit the Discover page to find popular servers and collections shared by the community.

follow.title: Follow Creators
follow.description: Follow users whose servers you find valuable to stay updated on their latest contributions.

discoverContent.tip: Use the search functionality to find servers for specific use cases or technologies.

nextSteps.title: Next Steps
nextSteps.custom: Develop your own custom MCP servers
